Text.Page:
All gulas eat people, but the {@LinkCreature:8#3011#gula mutilators} and {@LinkCreature:8#3031#ravagers} take great pleasure from it. That creeps me out.

It's time for retribution. Don't just kill themâ€”behead them! Maybe we'll make gula-head soup!

Blast and damnation! These things are revolting.

Why did I ask for severed heads again? Nevermind. You delivered. Well done!

If we don't stop these gulas, they're gonna get an appetite for -head soup. Or fricassee. Or ribs. Or -kebabs.

Wait, where was I?
